name: Asteria Table lamp
description: Built-in LED panel with diffuser ensures soft and uniform illumination throughout the room.Sleek, modern design highlighted by a brass stem that adds a touch of elegance.Hidden USB port allows for convenient phone charging, even when the light is off.

name: Karl-Johan Table lamp
description: The table lamp by New Works has exclusive, natural materials that blends harmoniously into the setting. The lamp is mushroom shaped and has softly curved forms which provides a soft andsuffused light.

name: Snoopy Table Lamp
description: Table lamp by Flos with a modern design with an enamelled reflector in metal and a lamp base in marble perfect for all rooms where you want direct lighting. It has a switch on the lamp base with dimmer function.

name: Night Owl Table Lamp
description: Table lamp by Fritz Hansen with a unique design with a conical lamp base, an oval lampshade in aluminium and nature inspired colours. It has a lampshade with four different positions and a black cable on the lamp base. The table lamp has a pleasant, downward light perfect for creating a cosy atmosphere in any room.

name: Olle Table Lamp
description: Olle is a table lamp from Bsweden, designed by Olle Andersson. The lamp has two geometric elements, a cylinder and a cone in white opal glass. The light from the cylinder flows through the cone and shines from top to bottom.

name: Flowerpot VP9
description: Table lamp by &tradition with an elegant, portable design with contemporary colours and a slightly smaller size to easily move around at home. It has a hemispherical, upper lampshade with a built-in LED and a warm white, pleasant light to create a cosy atmosphere. The lamp has a three-step dimmer on the lampshade to allow the regulation of light brightness.

name: Slant Table Lamp
description: The table lamp by Hay has an uncluttered, Japanese design perfect to have at home as well as at the office. The lamp has a beautiful, round screen in cast aluminium with an elegant, matte finish. It has a slightly, angled base with lovely weight and

name: Eddy Table Lamp EU
description: Eddy Table Lamp by Normann Copenhagen combines Italian marble with steel and brass details. The natural marble creates a lively expression while the table lamp emits a soft light that creates a calm and atmospheric feeling. The flat steel lampshade is facing downwards, which means that the lamp not only illuminates the surroundings but also itself. The light can be adjusted with a brass dimmer.
